_exec_summary.SummaryText:
COOPERATIVE ELEVATOR AND SUPPLY COMPANY OF MEADE, KANSAS IS AN AGRICULTURAL RETAIL BUSINESS WHICH SPECIALIZES IN AG INPUTS, SUCH AS FERTILIZERS, ANHYDROUS AMMONIA, AND AG CHEMICALS.                                                                                                                                                                       OUR PLANT CONSISTS OF TWO(2) 12,000 GALLON AND ONE(1) 8,000 GALLON TANK WITH A TOTAL CAPACITY OF APPROXIMATELY 115,328 POUNDS OF PRODUCT, WHEN FILLED TO MAXIMUM CAPACITY OF 85%.  DURING THE BUSY SEASON THERE ARE APPROXIMATELY 43 NURSE TRAILERS, MAXIMUM, AT THIS SITE.  THE FACILITY IS INSPECTED EACH YEAR BY THE KANSAS DEPT OF AGRICULTURE AND WE COMPLY WITH ALL THEIR REQUESTS FOR IMPROVEMENTS. THE PLANT STRICTLY ADHERES TO ALL FEDERAL, STATE, AND LOCAL REGULATIONS.                                                                                                                                                                              

OUR EMPLOYEES ARE TRAINED ON AN ANNUAL BASIS IN  EMERGENCY PROCEDURES, OPERATIONAL PROCEDURES, MAINTENANCE OPERATIONS, AND THE GENERAL HAZARDS AND SAFETY PROCEDURES FOR ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.  ARMED WITH THIS KNOWLEDGE, WE ARE HAPPY TO REPORT THAT NO ACCIDENTS OR PROPERTY DAMAGE HAVE OCCURRED AT THIS SITE WITHIN THE LAST FIVE YEARS.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          MEADE COUNTY FIRE DEPARTMENT HAS BEEN APPRISED OF OUR EMERGENCY ACTION PLAN, AS WELL AS MEADE COUNTY LEPC, AND  EMS.  THEY  ARE INVITED ANNUALLY, TO COME AND TOUR OUR FACILITY, AND HAVE AGREED TO BE OUR FIRST RESPONDERS IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY.  SINCE THIS IS AN AGRICULTURAL COMMUNITY, THEY ARE WELL AQUAINTED W
ITH THE DANGERS OF NH3. DURING OUR BUSY SEASON, WE HAVE APPROXIMATELY 43 NURSE TRAILERS ON THIS SITE.
